summary: The Misfits are an American punk rock band, known for mixing punk music with horror movie themes. Formed in 1977 by Glenn Danzig, they released several influential albums in the early 1980s. After breaking up and going through many lineup changes, they reunited in 1995 with a heavier sound. The band has inspired many other musicians. In 2016, the original members reunited for two shows.
title: Misfits (band)
